summary:
No need for trying to play a Khajiit with Tattoos as a Tiger. Now you can play with real Tigers!#

IMPORTANT!!!
For user of lower specs use the Lite Version if you think you can\'t handle the large one.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b74/Desert-Rat/Skyrim%20Mods/Banner2-1.jpg[/IMG]

[b]Hi everyone[/b]

This will change you Khajiits a bit, now you can play as a real Tiger, no need to \"try\" playing a Tiger with Khajiit Tattoos.
I changed the Normal Map a bit, if you don\'t like the normal map, just delete the \"_msn\" files 
to get the Vanilla ones. You can choose between White and theorange Default Skin.


[b]What is this Mod?[/b]

The Mod will replace your Vanilla Khajiit with high detail 2048 Tiger (White or Orange) textures. Also with new Normal Maps and an edited Face _s File.  There is a Lite Version for those who have a lower PC. They come in the resolution 1024x1024 but work and look nice too ;)

[b]How to install?[/b]

You can choose between a white or a orange Tiger . You can also mix them and make the Male default and the female white. Or the other way round.

Just copy the texture Folder into your Skyrim/Data Folder.


[b]How to uninstall this?[/b]

Simply be deleting the Khajiitmale and Khajiitfemale folder out of your \"textures/character/actors/\" Folder.... 


[b]Is it compatible with CBBE and similar Mods?[/b]

Yes you can use it with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE[/url] and other Mods like that. I didn\'t encountred any Bugs so far. If you find some, report them and i will fix them. ;)


[b]Credits[/b]

You can upload the File on other Sites aslong you name me as creator of the Mod.
Also you can add this to your own Mod, just give some credits for the work.

Thanks to Behtesda for this cool Game!

If you have made Screenshots, feel free to post them here, so other People see how they look, also i am really interrested in your Character.

I hope you enjoy my Mods!

Have fun,
JazzJR

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2741960]Take a look at my other Mods.[/url]
Thanks for your time. Feel free to comment if you like my Mod or if you found any bugs, or things to improve.



[IMG]http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b74/Desert-Rat/Banner.jpg[/IMG]
author: JazzJR
